meanings.definition: Capable of being moved easily along a surface.
meanings.sent1: The slidable puzzle piece glided effortlessly into place.
meanings.sent2: The slidable drawer smoothly opened with a gentle push.
meanings.sent3: The slidable chair made it fun to slide around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her slidable dance moves flowed gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The slidable wheels on the cart made transporting heavy items a breeze.

meanings.definition: Able to slide or move smoothly.
meanings.sent1: The slidable window opened easily to let in fresh air.
meanings.sent2: The slidable door closed quietly behind them.
meanings.sent3: The slidable ice skates made her glide like a swan on the frozen pond.
meanings.sent4: His slidable guitar playing mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The slidable curtain revealed a stunning view of the city skyline.
